name: (Unfinished Submission) Bullet Canvas
description:
(Unfinished Project) In Bullet Canvas, you can make a drawing that will be turned in a curtain of bullets. Draw the most efficient pattern in order to destroy every single enemy on screen.

In the current state, there is only one level and no Winning/Losing Condition, but the ability to draw patterns is fully functional, to this is basically a toy. Consider trying to shoot the red ships before the black ones for extra challenge. :)
